name: The Peanuts Movie: Snoopy's Grand Adventure
name_original: The Peanuts Movie: Snoopy's Grand Adventure
description:
The Peanuts Movie: Snoopy's Grand Adventure is a platformer game developed by Behaviour Interactive. It came out on 03-11-2015. Activison published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, The Peanuts Movie: Snoopy's Grand Adventure has a score of 60. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play The Peanuts Movie: Snoopy's Grand Adventure on Xbox One, Nintendo 3DS, Wii U and Xbox 360.
